snippet: David Peralta had three hits, including a two-run homer, and drove in four runs as the Arizona Diamondbacks avoided a series sweep with a 10-2 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates on Thursday night....

headline.print_headline: Peralta Has 4 RBIs, Diamondbacks Beat Pirates
headline.main: Peralta Has 4 RBIs, Diamondbacks Beat Pirates

lead_paragraph: David Peralta had three hits, including a two-run homer, and drove in four runs as the Arizona Diamondbacks avoided a series sweep with a 10-2 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates on Thursday night.
